DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate long-term safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics cariprazine patient bipolar I disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Safety Tolerability Cariprazine Bipolar I Disorder
DOC.criteria: Patients provide informed consent prior study specific procedure Patients currently meet Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition , Text Revision ( DSMIVTR ) criteria bipolar I disorder confirm Structured Clinical Interview Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition ( SCID ) Patients experience manic mixed episode require treatment within past 12 month Patients normal physical examination , laboratory , vital sign , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) Patients DSMIVTR diagnosis axis I disorder bipolar I disorder
